channel.title: Welcome to my logbook! on LILLIAN LIU
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my logbook! on LILLIAN LIU

item.title: ISEA Hackweek - Advances AI for Education Analytics
item.description: Excited to share that I recently completed a transformative Hackweek as part of the ISEA (Innovation Science for Education Analytics) program, which I’ve been fortunate to be a part of for the last six months.

item.title: Learning Analytics to the Rescue? A Personalized Learning Dashboard
item.description: I prototyped an innovative dashboard using R to transform how university teachers approach statistics education.

item.title: Does Student Confidence in STEM Courses Lead to Better Performance?
item.description: STEM education is crucial, but many students struggle to find a personal connection to science, leading to a lack of motivation in STEM-related studies (Franks and Capraro, 2019).

item.title: Does Student Confidence in STEM Courses Lead to Better Performance?
item.description: STEM education is crucial, but many students struggle to find a personal connection to science, leading to a lack of motivation in STEM-related studies (Franks and Capraro, 2019).

item.title: TeleCon, a pneumatically actuated flexible haptic wearable device
item.description: Introduction # This is a team project I collaborated on with artists from the Harvard Graduate School of Design and MIT Media Lab.

item.title: About
item.description: Learn more about me and why I am starting this blog.

item.title: The Motivational Dimensions of RoboMaster
item.description: Evaluating the Motivational Dimensions of the STEM Learning Experiences with a Robot # In 2018, as the learning experience designer and engineer at DJI, I led the launch of RoboMaster S1(RMS1), a STEM educational robot.
